mapper.sql: id, version, created_date, last_modified_date, orders, begin_date, content, end_date, path, title, type, url, ad_position_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ad( id , created_date , version , orders , begin_date , end_date , path , title , type , url , ad_position_id , content ) VALUES ( #{entity.id}, #{entity.createdDate}, #{entity.version}, #{entity.order}, #{entity.beginDate}, #{entity.endDate}, #{entity.path}, #{entity.title}, #{entity.type}, #{entity.url}, #{entity.adPosition.id}, #{entity.content} )
mapper.update: UPDATE ad SET last_modified_date = #{entity.lastModifiedDate}, version = #{entity.version} + 1, orders = #{entity.order}, begin_date = #{entity.beginDate}, end_date = #{entity.endDate}, path = #{entity.path}, title = #{entity.title}, type = #{entity.type}, url = #{entity.url}, ad_position_id = #{entity.adPosition.id}, content = #{entity.content} WHERE id = #{entity.id} AND version = #{entity.version}
